assessments.status_rationale: Today’s items discuss Trump administration actions and politics but provide no evidence that a full-year FY2026 DHS appropriations bill has been enacted and signed (as opposed to a continuing resolution). Deadline is 2026-03-31, so this remains unresolved.
No news bullet indicates the European Commission has opened formal DSA proceedings against X via a published Commission press release/statement. Deadline is 2026-04-30.

The provided business/tech coverage mentions Nvidia stock and broader AI spending but contains no announcement of a completed Nvidia equity investment into OpenAI (nor a denial that would resolve it). Deadline is 2026-06-30.

While there are references to a tech sell-off and large single-stock declines (e.g., AMD), the bullets do not document an S&P 500 close-to-close drop of 4.0% or more, which is required to resolve the prediction. Deadline is 2026-03-31.
No bullet provides gold (XAU/USD) closing levels, and nothing indicates a daily close at or above $5,250. Deadline is 2026-03-31.
There is no mention of Y Combinator publishing updated standard funding documentation or policy language explicitly allowing founder disbursements in a named stablecoin. Deadline is 2026-04-30.
None of the bullets reference Moody’s/S&P/Fitch actions on Oracle’s credit outlook (Negative/Negative Watch). Deadline is 2026-06-30.

The China-related headline concerns Xi pressing Trump on Taiwan in a phone call, not a public announcement of removal/suspension/'under investigation' of a CMC member or PLA service chief. Deadline is 2026-04-30.

One item notes upcoming U.S.-Iran talks and de-escalation hopes in oil markets, but there is no public confirmation by USCENTCOM/U.S. Navy of an additional kinetic engagement involving an Iranian drone near a U.S. naval vessel. Deadline is 2026-03-31.

The bullets include a NYC-WHO partnership story, but nothing indicates WHO has published a funding appeal warning of NTD resurgence in Africa requesting at least $100 million in additional funding. Deadline is 2026-12-31.
